channel.title: nfcpy on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in nfcpy on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Read FeliCa IDm with raspberrypi3 (pasori RC-S380 version)
item.description: Click here to read FeliCa IDm on pasori RC-S320 (http://qiita.com/t114/items/819a9cdfe90ea98dd4d3) Basically it is exactly what is written in Official of nfcpy It was. #Environment Hard: raspberrypi3 OS: raspbian Leader: pasori RC-S380 #nfcpy installation In the case of nfcpy version 0.10, IDm could not be read well when reading FeliCa of Osaifu-Keitai or license, so 0.9 is installed below. $ sudo apt-get install python-usb $ sudo apt-get install bzr $ mkdir nfcpy $ cd nfcpy $ bzr branch lp:nfcpy/0.
